text: We'll start with the girl. She's going to reseal a cookie. Her brother is taking cookies out of a jar. He got careless. She's asking him for one, so he's handing one down to her. In the meantime, he is getting ready to fall off of a stool, a three-legged stool. . Her mother is not paying much attention. She's looking out the window. And in looking out the window why she but
